actions.name: Seasonal
actions.description:
Effect: Seasonal takes up both the user's Starting and Basic Ability Slots. The user gains the following Abilities, based on the current season and current Forme:
- Spring: Chlorophyll, Blossom Swirl
- Summer: Chloroplast, Raw Firepower
- Autumn: Overcoat, Overgrow
- Winter: Holiday Cheer, Aurora Borealis

actions.name: Dimensional Rifts

cost.trigger: The user declares Hyperspace Hole or Hyperspace Fury.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Hyperspace Hole or Hyperspace Fury.
Effect: Connection - Hyperspace Hole. The user can leave behind a Rift after resolving Hyperspace Hole. At the end of a round, the user freely uses Metronome, originating its effect from the Rift, on a nearby target chosen by the user. The Rift lasts for 3 Rounds. When declaring Hyperspace Fury, the user can give the attack [Blast 3], or alternatively spend an additional 6 PP to chance its Range to "12m Burst" and give it [Exhaust] for the rest of the user's Activation.

actions.name: Dimensional Rifts
actions.description: Passive: The user can choose to originate their attacks (other than Hyperspace Hole and Hyperspace Fury) any space within 10m of the user, and any such spaces can be treated as the user's space for originating Abilities (such as Magician). When in Unbound Forme, the user's Hyperspace Hole is replaced with Hyperspace Fury.

actions.name: Commander

cost.trigger: The user and an ally Dondozo are on the Field at the same time.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user and an ally Dondozo are on the Field at the same time.
Effect: The user transforms into a Belt Item for an ally Dondozo, freely moving and equipping itself to the ally Dondozo. This alters the effect of that creature's Order Up attack. An equipped Tatsugiri is unable to perform any actions besides the Free Action of this ability. When equipped to a Dondozo whose HP is less than 1/2 their Max HP, Tatsugiri sets its HP to 0 and increases Dodonzo's ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD stages by +2 for 5 activations as a Free Action. If the ally Dodonzo gains @Affliction[fainted] while equipped with the user, the user is brought out onto the field in an open space adjacent to the ally Dondozo. This ability can only be used once per combat.
